name: Knife Knight
description:
Knife Knight - a top-down Zelda-like adventure video game by Kay Zaman for PGMMV Annimversary Jam 2020.

How-to-Control (Player 1)
Controller (X-Input Recommend) :

Move - D-Pad / Directional Pad

Throw knife : X Button

Reset : Back + Start / Select + Start

Keyboard:

Up    :  Up key
Down  :  Down Key
Left  :  Left Key
Right :  Right Key

Throw knife  :  X key

Menu bar : F1

You are Knife Knight. You want to celebrate your birthday alone but Ogre stole your cake. Enter his dungeon and take your cake back.

Reminder : If the game start and press controller's button, the game identifies that the controller is Player 1.
           If the game start and press keyboard's key, the game identifies that the keyboard is Player 1.

Project by Kay Zaman

Tileset by Raou https://raou.itch.io/
